code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TransactionList=_ref=>{let{transactions,userId}=_ref;if(!transactions||transactions.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"Nema transakcija."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-4 rounded shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Istorija Transakcija"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"divide-y divide-gray-200",children:transactions.map(tx=>{const isSender=tx.senderId===userId;const type=isSender?'Poslato':'Primljeno';const typeColor=isSender?'text-red-600':'text-green-600';const counterParty=isSender?tx.receiverId:tx.senderId;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"py-3 flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-semibold ".concat(typeColor),children:type})," ",tx.amount," ",tx.currency,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500 block",children:[isSender?"ka ".concat(counterParty):"od ".concat(counterParty)," - ",new Date(tx.date).toLocaleDateString()]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/transactions/".concat(tx.id),className:"text-blue-500 hover:underline",children:"Detalji"})]},tx.id);})})]});};export default TransactionList;
